text: The 1989 European Parliament election for the election of the delegation from the Netherlands was held on 15 June 1989. This is the 3rd time the elections had been held for the European elections in the Netherlands. Sources for everything below: Data of the 1989 European Election by the Electoral Committee == Numbering of the candidates list == The official order and names of candidate lists: == Candidate lists == === Labour Party/European Socialists === Below is the candidate list for the Labour Party for the 1989 European Parliament election Elected members are in bold {|class="wikitable vatop" ! Number ! Candidate ! Sex ! Preference vote !
